name: Ignition (itch) (lyammosnier)
description:
Ignition

Blast your way out the atmosphere!

Rockets:

  • Artemis 1: SLS w/ orion
  • Apollo 11: Saturn V - WIP
  • Apollo 13: Saturn V - WIP
  • Crew-2: Falcon 9 w/ Endeavour - WIP

Special features:

  • Golang at your own pace (see what I did there?)

This is still heavily in WIP and updates should come weekly, if not daily
